Feb. 12, 1938 D Reading and District Band League Annual Contest (Second Section)
Reading and District Band League Annual Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Reading and District Band League Annual Contest reading-and-district-band-league-annual--4182
None
Reading, Berkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Spring Gardens, 2nd Uxbridge and Hillingdon, 3rd Wroughton Silver. 6 bands competed.
This is described in Musical Progress & Mail March 1938 as "the Reading and District Band League['s] ... first contest". Does this mean that their series established in 1926 had lapsed by this time or that this was a second R&DBL contest?
Nov. 18, 2013, 4:37 p.m. Nov. 22, 2013, 5:37 p.m.
1 Pangbourne & District Silver Band J. Lambden
2 Wroughton Silver Fred Richards
3 Sandhurst Silver Fred Bennellick
